briefdescription.para: Get the "version" meta-name.
Get the "signature" meta-name.
Get the "include" meta-name.
Get the "features" meta-name.
An enum to address predefined meta-names.
The array-type to return all meta-names.
The storage type of this name (depends on the name type).
The number of predefined meta-names.
The type of this name.
The value, depending on the type.
Create a new unchecked name with the given type.

simplesect.para: For user code: Please use createRegular(), createText() and createIndex() for future compatibility and additional syntax checks.

parameterdescription.para: The text or index of the name.

briefdescription.para: Get the decimal digit-count of the index.
Default constructor.
Default destructor.
Compare two names lexicographically.
Test two names for equality.

simplesect.para: true if both names compare equal.

briefdescription.para: Get the type of this name.
Test if this is an empty regular name.

detaileddescription.para:
An empty name is not valid and created by the default constructor.
true if this name is empty and of type Regular, false otherwise.

briefdescription.para: Test if this name is of type Regular.

simplesect.para: true if the name type is Regular, false otherwise.

briefdescription.para: Test if this name is of type Text.

simplesect.para: true if the name type is Text, false otherwise.

briefdescription.para: Test if this name is of type Index.

simplesect.para: true if the name type is Index, false otherwise.

briefdescription.para: Test if this name is of type TextIndex.

simplesect.para: true if the name type is TextIndex, false otherwise.

briefdescription.para: Test if this is a meta name (regular and starts with '@').

simplesect.para: true if the name is Regular, non-empty, and begins with an '@' character.

briefdescription.para: Get the value as text.

simplesect.para: The value as text. An index is converted into text.

briefdescription.para: Get the value as an index.

simplesect.para: The value as index, or zero for Root, Regular and Text.

briefdescription.para: Fast, get the size of the path text.
Create a representation of the name for a name path.
Get a hash value for this name.
Test if this name is a reserved validation-rules name.
Test if this name is an escaped reserved validation-rules name.
Get this name with the reserved prefix removed.
Create a regular name.

listitem.para: Converts any valid name into its normalized form.
Spacing around the name is not allowed.

parameterdescription.para: The name in any valid format. No spacing around the name is allowed.
(Syntax, LimitExceeded, Encoding) If there is any problem with the name.

briefdescription.para: Create a text name.

parameterdescription.para: The text name (without the double quotes).
(Syntax, LimitExceeded, Encoding) If there is any problem with the name.

briefdescription.para: Create a text name.

parameterdescription.para: The text name (without the double quotes).
(Syntax, LimitExceeded, Encoding) If there is any problem with the name.

briefdescription.para: Create an index name (for list elements).
Create a text index name (for text names in a section).
Normalizes and verifies a regular name.

listitem.para: Tests if the name only contains valid characters.
Tests if the name does not exceed the length limit.

parameterdescription.para: (Syntax, LimitExceeded, Encoding) in case of any problem.

briefdescription.para: Verifies a text name.

listitem.para: Test for encoding errors and not allowed zero code-points.
Test if the text exceeds the size limit.

parameterdescription.para: (LimitExceeded, Encoding) in case of any problem.

briefdescription.para: Access a list of all supported meta-names.
Return an empty instance of a name.
Represents a single name.

listitem.para: A regular name is always converted into its normalized lower-case form.
A text-name is kept as is.
An index-name is neither normalized nor range checked.
